43/*
44 * Match flag 'opt' in *optsp, and if allow_negate is set then also match
45 * 'no-opt'. Returns -1 if option not matched, 1 if option matches or 0
46 * if negated option matches.
47 * If the option or negated option matches, then *optsp is updated to
48 * point to the first character after the option.
49 */
50static int
51opt_flag(const char *opt, int allow_negate, const char **optsp)
52{
53 size_t opt_len = strlen(opt);
54 const char *opts = *optsp;
55 int negate = 0;
56
57 if (allow_negate && strncasecmp(opts, "no-", 3) == 0) {
58 opts += 3;
59 negate = 1;
60 }
61 if (strncasecmp(opts, opt, opt_len) == 0) {
62 *optsp = opts + opt_len;
63 return negate ? 0 : 1;
64 }
65 return -1;
66}
67
68static char *
69opt_dequote(const char **sp, const char **errstrp)
70{
71 const char *s = *sp;
72 char *ret;
73 size_t i;
74
75 *errstrp = NULL;
76 if (*s != '"') {
77 *errstrp = "missing start quote";
78 return NULL;
79 }
80 s++;
81 if ((ret = malloc(strlen((s)) + 1)) == NULL) {
82 *errstrp = "memory allocation failed";
83 return NULL;
84 }
85 for (i = 0; *s != '\0' && *s != '"';) {
86 if (s[0] == '\\' && s[1] == '"')
87 s++;
88 ret[i++] = *s++;
89 }
90 if (*s == '\0') {
91 *errstrp = "missing end quote";
92 free(ret);
93 return NULL;
94 }
95 ret[i] = '\0';
96 s++;
97 *sp = s;
98 return ret;
99}
100
101static int
102opt_match(const char **opts, const char *term)
103{
104 if (strncasecmp((*opts), term, strlen(term)) == 0 &&
105 (*opts)[strlen(term)] == '=') {
106 *opts += strlen(term) + 1;
107 return 1;
108 }
109 return 0;
110}
111
112static int
113dup_strings(char ***dstp, size_t *ndstp, char **src, size_t nsrc)
114{
115 char **dst;
116 size_t i, j;
117
118 *dstp = NULL;
119 *ndstp = 0;
120 if (nsrc == 0)
121 return 0;
122
123 if ((dst = calloc(nsrc, sizeof(*src))) == NULL)
124 return -1;
125 for (i = 0; i < nsrc; i++) {
126 if ((dst[i] = strdup(src[i])) == NULL) {
127 for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
128 free(dst[j]);
129 free(dst);
130 return -1;
131 }
132 }
133 /* success */
134 *dstp = dst;
135 *ndstp = nsrc;
136 return 0;
137}
138
139#define OPTIONS_CRITICAL 1
140#define OPTIONS_EXTENSIONS 2
141static int
142cert_option_list(struct sshauthopt *opts, struct sshbuf *oblob,
143 u_int which, int crit)
144{
145 char *command, *allowed;
146 char *name = NULL;
147 struct sshbuf *c = NULL, *data = NULL;
148 int r, ret = -1, found;
149
150 if ((c = sshbuf_fromb(oblob)) == NULL) {
151 error("%s: sshbuf_fromb failed", __func__);
152 goto out;
153 }
154
155 while (sshbuf_len(c) > 0) {
156 sshbuf_free(data);
157 data = NULL;
158 if ((r = sshbuf_get_cstring(c, &name, NULL)) != 0 ||
159 (r = sshbuf_froms(c, &data)) != 0) {
160 error("Unable to parse certificate options: %s",
161 ssh_err(r));
162 goto out;
163 }
164 debug3("found certificate option \"%.100s\" len %zu",
165 name, sshbuf_len(data));
166 found = 0;
167 if ((which & OPTIONS_EXTENSIONS) != 0) {
168 if (strcmp(name, "permit-X11-forwarding") == 0) {
169 opts->permit_x11_forwarding_flag = 1;
170 found = 1;
171 } else if (strcmp(name,
172 "permit-agent-forwarding") == 0) {
173 opts->permit_agent_forwarding_flag = 1;
174 found = 1;
175 } else if (strcmp(name,
176 "permit-port-forwarding") == 0) {
177 opts->permit_port_forwarding_flag = 1;
178 found = 1;
179 } else if (strcmp(name, "permit-pty") == 0) {
180 opts->permit_pty_flag = 1;
181 found = 1;
182 } else if (strcmp(name, "permit-user-rc") == 0) {
183 opts->permit_user_rc = 1;
184 found = 1;
185 }
186 }
187 if (!found && (which & OPTIONS_CRITICAL) != 0) {
188 if (strcmp(name, "force-command") == 0) {
189 if ((r = sshbuf_get_cstring(data, &command,
190 NULL)) != 0) {
191 error("Unable to parse \"%s\" "
192 "section: %s", name, ssh_err(r));
193 goto out;
194 }
195 if (opts->force_command != NULL) {
196 error("Certificate has multiple "
197 "force-command options");
198 free(command);
199 goto out;
200 }
201 opts->force_command = command;
202 found = 1;
203 }
204 if (strcmp(name, "source-address") == 0) {
205 if ((r = sshbuf_get_cstring(data, &allowed,
206 NULL)) != 0) {
207 error("Unable to parse \"%s\" "
208 "section: %s", name, ssh_err(r));
209 goto out;
210 }
211 if (opts->required_from_host_cert != NULL) {
212 error("Certificate has multiple "
213 "source-address options");
214 free(allowed);
215 goto out;
216 }
217 /* Check syntax */
218 if (addr_match_cidr_list(NULL, allowed) == -1) {
219 error("Certificate source-address "
220 "contents invalid");
221 goto out;
222 }
223 opts->required_from_host_cert = allowed;
224 found = 1;
225 }
226 }
227
228 if (!found) {
229 if (crit) {
230 error("Certificate critical option \"%s\" "
231 "is not supported", name);
232 goto out;
233 } else {
234 logit("Certificate extension \"%s\" "
235 "is not supported", name);
236 }
237 } else if (sshbuf_len(data) != 0) {
238 error("Certificate option \"%s\" corrupt "
239 "(extra data)", name);
240 goto out;
241 }
242 free(name);
243 name = NULL;
244 }
245 /* successfully parsed all options */
246 ret = 0;
247
248 out:
249 free(name);
250 sshbuf_free(data);
251 sshbuf_free(c);
252 return ret;
253}
254
255struct sshauthopt *
256sshauthopt_new(void)
257{
258 struct sshauthopt *ret;
259
260 if ((ret = calloc(1, sizeof(*ret))) == NULL)
261 return NULL;
262 ret->force_tun_device = -1;
263 return ret;
264}
265
266void
267sshauthopt_free(struct sshauthopt *opts)
268{
269 size_t i;
270
271 if (opts == NULL)
272 return;
273
274 free(opts->cert_principals);
275 free(opts->force_command);
276 free(opts->required_from_host_cert);
277 free(opts->required_from_host_keys);
278
279 for (i = 0; i < opts->nenv; i++)
280 free(opts->env[i]);
281 free(opts->env);
282
283 for (i = 0; i < opts->npermitopen; i++)
284 free(opts->permitopen[i]);
285 free(opts->permitopen);
286
287 for (i = 0; i < opts->npermitlisten; i++)
288 free(opts->permitlisten[i]);
289 free(opts->permitlisten);
290
291 explicit_bzero(opts, sizeof(*opts));
292 free(opts);
293}
294
295struct sshauthopt *
296sshauthopt_new_with_keys_defaults(void)
297{
298 struct sshauthopt *ret = NULL;
299
300 if ((ret = sshauthopt_new()) == NULL)
301 return NULL;
302
303 /* Defaults for authorized_keys flags */
304 ret->permit_port_forwarding_flag = 1;
305 ret->permit_agent_forwarding_flag = 1;
306 ret->permit_x11_forwarding_flag = 1;
307 ret->permit_pty_flag = 1;
308 ret->permit_user_rc = 1;
309 return ret;
310}
311
312/*
313 * Parse and record a permitopen/permitlisten directive.
314 * Return 0 on success. Return -1 on failure and sets *errstrp to error reason.
315 */
316static int
317handle_permit(const char **optsp, int allow_bare_port,
318 char ***permitsp, size_t *npermitsp, const char **errstrp)
319{
320 char *opt, *tmp, *cp, *host, **permits = *permitsp;
321 size_t npermits = *npermitsp;
322 const char *errstr = "unknown error";
323
324 if (npermits > INT_MAX) {
325 *errstrp = "too many permission directives";
326 return -1;
327 }
328 if ((opt = opt_dequote(optsp, &errstr)) == NULL) {
329 return -1;
330 }
331 if (allow_bare_port && strchr(opt, ':') == NULL) {
332 /*
333 * Allow a bare port number in permitlisten to indicate a
334 * listen_host wildcard.
335 */
336 if (asprintf(&tmp, "*:%s", opt) < 0) {
337 *errstrp = "memory allocation failed";
338 return -1;
339 }
340 free(opt);
341 opt = tmp;
342 }
343 if ((tmp = strdup(opt)) == NULL) {
344 free(opt);
345 *errstrp = "memory allocation failed";
346 return -1;
347 }
348 cp = tmp;
349 /* validate syntax before recording it. */
350 host = hpdelim(&cp);
351 if (host == NULL || strlen(host) >= NI_MAXHOST) {
352 free(tmp);
353 free(opt);
354 *errstrp = "invalid permission hostname";
355 return -1;
356 }
357 /*
358 * don't want to use permitopen_port to avoid
359 * dependency on channels.[ch] here.
360 */
361 if (cp == NULL ||
362 (strcmp(cp, "*") != 0 && a2port(cp) <= 0)) {
363 free(tmp);
364 free(opt);
365 *errstrp = "invalid permission port";
366 return -1;
367 }
368 /* XXX - add streamlocal support */
369 free(tmp);
370 /* Record it */
371 if ((permits = recallocarray(permits, npermits, npermits + 1,
372 sizeof(*permits))) == NULL) {
373 free(opt);
374 /* NB. don't update *permitsp if alloc fails */
375 *errstrp = "memory allocation failed";
376 return -1;
377 }
378 permits[npermits++] = opt;
379 *permitsp = permits;
380 *npermitsp = npermits;
381 return 0;
382}
383
384struct sshauthopt *
385sshauthopt_parse(const char *opts, const char **errstrp)
386{
387 char **oarray, *opt, *cp, *tmp;
388 int r;
389 struct sshauthopt *ret = NULL;
390 const char *errstr = "unknown error";
391 uint64_t valid_before;
392
393 if (errstrp != NULL)
394 *errstrp = NULL;
395 if ((ret = sshauthopt_new_with_keys_defaults()) == NULL)
396 goto alloc_fail;
397
398 if (opts == NULL)
399 return ret;
400
401 while (*opts && *opts != ' ' && *opts != '\t') {
402 /* flag options */
403 if ((r = opt_flag("restrict", 0, &opts)) != -1) {
404 ret->restricted = 1;
405 ret->permit_port_forwarding_flag = 0;
406 ret->permit_agent_forwarding_flag = 0;
407 ret->permit_x11_forwarding_flag = 0;
408 ret->permit_pty_flag = 0;
409 ret->permit_user_rc = 0;
410 } else if ((r = opt_flag("cert-authority", 0, &opts)) != -1) {
411 ret->cert_authority = r;
412 } else if ((r = opt_flag("port-forwarding", 1, &opts)) != -1) {
413 ret->permit_port_forwarding_flag = r == 1;
414 } else if ((r = opt_flag("agent-forwarding", 1, &opts)) != -1) {
415 ret->permit_agent_forwarding_flag = r == 1;
416 } else if ((r = opt_flag("x11-forwarding", 1, &opts)) != -1) {
417 ret->permit_x11_forwarding_flag = r == 1;
418 } else if ((r = opt_flag("pty", 1, &opts)) != -1) {
419 ret->permit_pty_flag = r == 1;
420 } else if ((r = opt_flag("user-rc", 1, &opts)) != -1) {
421 ret->permit_user_rc = r == 1;
422 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "command")) {
423 if (ret->force_command != NULL) {
424 errstr = "multiple \"command\" clauses";
425 goto fail;
426 }
427 ret->force_command = opt_dequote(&opts, &errstr);
428 if (ret->force_command == NULL)
429 goto fail;
430 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "principals")) {
431 if (ret->cert_principals != NULL) {
432 errstr = "multiple \"principals\" clauses";
433 goto fail;
434 }
435 ret->cert_principals = opt_dequote(&opts, &errstr);
436 if (ret->cert_principals == NULL)
437 goto fail;
438 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "from")) {
439 if (ret->required_from_host_keys != NULL) {
440 errstr = "multiple \"from\" clauses";
441 goto fail;
442 }
443 ret->required_from_host_keys = opt_dequote(&opts,
444 &errstr);
445 if (ret->required_from_host_keys == NULL)
446 goto fail;
447 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "expiry-time")) {
448 if ((opt = opt_dequote(&opts, &errstr)) == NULL)
449 goto fail;
450 if (parse_absolute_time(opt, &valid_before) != 0 ||
451 valid_before == 0) {
452 free(opt);
453 errstr = "invalid expires time";
454 goto fail;
455 }
456 free(opt);
457 if (ret->valid_before == 0 ||
458 valid_before < ret->valid_before)
459 ret->valid_before = valid_before;
460 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "environment")) {
461 if (ret->nenv > INT_MAX) {
462 errstr = "too many environment strings";
463 goto fail;
464 }
465 if ((opt = opt_dequote(&opts, &errstr)) == NULL)
466 goto fail;
467 /* env name must be alphanumeric and followed by '=' */
468 if ((tmp = strchr(opt, '=')) == NULL) {
469 free(opt);
470 errstr = "invalid environment string";
471 goto fail;
472 }
473 if ((cp = strdup(opt)) == NULL)
474 goto alloc_fail;
475 cp[tmp - opt] = '\0'; /* truncate at '=' */
476 if (!valid_env_name(cp)) {
477 free(cp);
478 free(opt);
479 errstr = "invalid environment string";
480 goto fail;
481 }
482 free(cp);
483 /* Append it. */
484 oarray = ret->env;
485 if ((ret->env = recallocarray(ret->env, ret->nenv,
486 ret->nenv + 1, sizeof(*ret->env))) == NULL) {
487 free(opt);
488 ret->env = oarray; /* put it back for cleanup */
489 goto alloc_fail;
490 }
491 ret->env[ret->nenv++] = opt;
492 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "permitopen")) {
493 if (handle_permit(&opts, 0, &ret->permitopen,
494 &ret->npermitopen, &errstr) != 0)
495 goto fail;
496 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "permitlisten")) {
497 if (handle_permit(&opts, 1, &ret->permitlisten,
498 &ret->npermitlisten, &errstr) != 0)
499 goto fail;
500 } else if (opt_match(&opts, "tunnel")) {
501 if ((opt = opt_dequote(&opts, &errstr)) == NULL)
502 goto fail;
503 ret->force_tun_device = a2tun(opt, NULL);
504 free(opt);
505 if (ret->force_tun_device == SSH_TUNID_ERR) {
506 errstr = "invalid tun device";
507 goto fail;
508 }
509 }
510 /*
511 * Skip the comma, and move to the next option
512 * (or break out if there are no more).
513 */
514 if (*opts == '\0' || *opts == ' ' || *opts == '\t')
515 break; /* End of options. */
516 /* Anything other than a comma is an unknown option */
517 if (*opts != ',') {
518 errstr = "unknown key option";
519 goto fail;
520 }
521 opts++;
522 if (*opts == '\0') {
523 errstr = "unexpected end-of-options";
524 goto fail;
525 }
526 }
527
528 /* success */
529 if (errstrp != NULL)
530 *errstrp = NULL;
531 return ret;
532
533alloc_fail:
534 errstr = "memory allocation failed";
535fail:
536 sshauthopt_free(ret);
537 if (errstrp != NULL)
538 *errstrp = errstr;
539 return NULL;
540}
541
542struct sshauthopt *
543sshauthopt_from_cert(struct sshkey *k)
544{
545 struct sshauthopt *ret;
546
547 if (k == NULL || !sshkey_type_is_cert(k->type) || k->cert == NULL ||
548 k->cert->type != SSH2_CERT_TYPE_USER)
549 return NULL;
550
551 if ((ret = sshauthopt_new()) == NULL)
552 return NULL;
553
554 /* Handle options and critical extensions separately */
555 if (cert_option_list(ret, k->cert->critical,
556 OPTIONS_CRITICAL, 1) == -1) {
557 sshauthopt_free(ret);
558 return NULL;
559 }
560 if (cert_option_list(ret, k->cert->extensions,
561 OPTIONS_EXTENSIONS, 0) == -1) {
562 sshauthopt_free(ret);
563 return NULL;
564 }
565 /* success */
566 return ret;
567}
568
569/*
570 * Merges "additional" options to "primary" and returns the result.
571 * NB. Some options from primary have primacy.
572 */
573struct sshauthopt *
574sshauthopt_merge(const struct sshauthopt *primary,
575 const struct sshauthopt *additional, const char **errstrp)
576{
577 struct sshauthopt *ret;
578 const char *errstr = "internal error";
579 const char *tmp;
580
581 if (errstrp != NULL)
582 *errstrp = NULL;
583
584 if ((ret = sshauthopt_new()) == NULL)
585 goto alloc_fail;
586
587 /* cert_authority and cert_principals are cleared in result */
588
589 /* Prefer access lists from primary. */
590 /* XXX err is both set and mismatch? */
591 tmp = primary->required_from_host_cert;
592 if (tmp == NULL)
593 tmp = additional->required_from_host_cert;
594 if (tmp != NULL && (ret->required_from_host_cert = strdup(tmp)) == NULL)
595 goto alloc_fail;
596 tmp = primary->required_from_host_keys;
597 if (tmp == NULL)
598 tmp = additional->required_from_host_keys;
599 if (tmp != NULL && (ret->required_from_host_keys = strdup(tmp)) == NULL)
600 goto alloc_fail;
601
602 /*
603 * force_tun_device, permitopen/permitlisten and environment all
604 * prefer the primary.
605 */
606 ret->force_tun_device = primary->force_tun_device;
607 if (ret->force_tun_device == -1)
608 ret->force_tun_device = additional->force_tun_device;
609 if (primary->nenv > 0) {
610 if (dup_strings(&ret->env, &ret->nenv,
611 primary->env, primary->nenv) != 0)
612 goto alloc_fail;
613 } else if (additional->nenv) {
614 if (dup_strings(&ret->env, &ret->nenv,
615 additional->env, additional->nenv) != 0)
616 goto alloc_fail;
617 }
618 if (primary->npermitopen > 0) {
619 if (dup_strings(&ret->permitopen, &ret->npermitopen,
620 primary->permitopen, primary->npermitopen) != 0)
621 goto alloc_fail;
622 } else if (additional->npermitopen > 0) {
623 if (dup_strings(&ret->permitopen, &ret->npermitopen,
624 additional->permitopen, additional->npermitopen) != 0)
625 goto alloc_fail;
626 }
627
628 if (primary->npermitlisten > 0) {
629 if (dup_strings(&ret->permitlisten, &ret->npermitlisten,
630 primary->permitlisten, primary->npermitlisten) != 0)
631 goto alloc_fail;
632 } else if (additional->npermitlisten > 0) {
633 if (dup_strings(&ret->permitlisten, &ret->npermitlisten,
634 additional->permitlisten, additional->npermitlisten) != 0)
635 goto alloc_fail;
636 }
637
638 /* Flags are logical-AND (i.e. must be set in both for permission) */
639#define OPTFLAG(x) ret->x = (primary->x == 1) && (additional->x == 1)
640 OPTFLAG(permit_port_forwarding_flag);
641 OPTFLAG(permit_agent_forwarding_flag);
642 OPTFLAG(permit_x11_forwarding_flag);
643 OPTFLAG(permit_pty_flag);
644 OPTFLAG(permit_user_rc);
645#undef OPTFLAG
646
647 /* Earliest expiry time should win */
648 if (primary->valid_before != 0)
649 ret->valid_before = primary->valid_before;
650 if (additional->valid_before != 0 &&
651 additional->valid_before < ret->valid_before)
652 ret->valid_before = additional->valid_before;
653
654 /*
655 * When both multiple forced-command are specified, only
656 * proceed if they are identical, otherwise fail.
657 */
658 if (primary->force_command != NULL &&
659 additional->force_command != NULL) {
660 if (strcmp(primary->force_command,
661 additional->force_command) == 0) {
662 /* ok */
663 ret->force_command = strdup(primary->force_command);
664 if (ret->force_command == NULL)
665 goto alloc_fail;
666 } else {
667 errstr = "forced command options do not match";
668 goto fail;
669 }
670 } else if (primary->force_command != NULL) {
671 if ((ret->force_command = strdup(
672 primary->force_command)) == NULL)
673 goto alloc_fail;
674 } else if (additional->force_command != NULL) {
675 if ((ret->force_command = strdup(
676 additional->force_command)) == NULL)
677 goto alloc_fail;
678 }
679 /* success */
680 if (errstrp != NULL)
681 *errstrp = NULL;
682 return ret;
683
684 alloc_fail:
685 errstr = "memory allocation failed";
686 fail:
687 if (errstrp != NULL)
688 *errstrp = errstr;
689 sshauthopt_free(ret);
690 return NULL;
691}
692
693/*
694 * Copy options
695 */
696struct sshauthopt *
697sshauthopt_copy(const struct sshauthopt *orig)
698{
699 struct sshauthopt *ret;
700
701 if ((ret = sshauthopt_new()) == NULL)
702 return NULL;
703
704#define OPTSCALAR(x) ret->x = orig->x
705 OPTSCALAR(permit_port_forwarding_flag);
706 OPTSCALAR(permit_agent_forwarding_flag);
707 OPTSCALAR(permit_x11_forwarding_flag);
708 OPTSCALAR(permit_pty_flag);
709 OPTSCALAR(permit_user_rc);
710 OPTSCALAR(restricted);
711 OPTSCALAR(cert_authority);
712 OPTSCALAR(force_tun_device);
713 OPTSCALAR(valid_before);
714#undef OPTSCALAR
715#define OPTSTRING(x) \
716 do { \
717 if (orig->x != NULL && (ret->x = strdup(orig->x)) == NULL) { \
718 sshauthopt_free(ret); \
719 return NULL; \
720 } \
721 } while (0)
722 OPTSTRING(cert_principals);
723 OPTSTRING(force_command);
724 OPTSTRING(required_from_host_cert);
725 OPTSTRING(required_from_host_keys);
726#undef OPTSTRING
727
728 if (dup_strings(&ret->env, &ret->nenv, orig->env, orig->nenv) != 0 ||
729 dup_strings(&ret->permitopen, &ret->npermitopen,
730 orig->permitopen, orig->npermitopen) != 0 ||
731 dup_strings(&ret->permitlisten, &ret->npermitlisten,
732 orig->permitlisten, orig->npermitlisten) != 0) {
733 sshauthopt_free(ret);
734 return NULL;
735 }
736 return ret;
737}
738
739static int
740serialise_array(struct sshbuf *m, char **a, size_t n)
741{
742 struct sshbuf *b;
743 size_t i;
744 int r;
745
746 if (n > INT_MAX)
747 return SSH_ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR;
748
749 if ((b = sshbuf_new()) == NULL) {
750 return SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
751 }
752 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
753 if ((r = sshbuf_put_cstring(b, a[i])) != 0) {
754 sshbuf_free(b);
755 return r;
756 }
757 }
758 if ((r = sshbuf_put_u32(m, n)) != 0 ||
759 (r = sshbuf_put_stringb(m, b)) != 0) {
760 sshbuf_free(b);
761 return r;
762 }
763 /* success */
764 return 0;
765}
766
767static int
768deserialise_array(struct sshbuf *m, char ***ap, size_t *np)
769{
770 char **a = NULL;
771 size_t i, n = 0;
772 struct sshbuf *b = NULL;
773 u_int tmp;
774 int r = SSH_ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR;
775
776 if ((r = sshbuf_get_u32(m, &tmp)) != 0 ||
777 (r = sshbuf_froms(m, &b)) != 0)
778 goto out;
779 if (tmp > INT_MAX) {
780 r = SSH_ERR_INVALID_FORMAT;
781 goto out;
782 }
783 n = tmp;
784 if (n > 0 && (a = calloc(n, sizeof(*a))) == NULL) {
785 r = SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
786 goto out;
787 }
788 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
789 if ((r = sshbuf_get_cstring(b, &a[i], NULL)) != 0)
790 goto out;
791 }
792 /* success */
793 r = 0;
794 *ap = a;
795 a = NULL;
796 *np = n;
797 n = 0;
798 out:
799 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
800 free(a[i]);
801 free(a);
802 sshbuf_free(b);
803 return r;
804}
805
806static int
807serialise_nullable_string(struct sshbuf *m, const char *s)
808{
809 int r;
810
811 if ((r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, s == NULL)) != 0 ||
812 (r = sshbuf_put_cstring(m, s)) != 0)
813 return r;
814 return 0;
815}
816
817static int
818deserialise_nullable_string(struct sshbuf *m, char **sp)
819{
820 int r;
821 u_char flag;
822
823 *sp = NULL;
824 if ((r = sshbuf_get_u8(m, &flag)) != 0 ||
825 (r = sshbuf_get_cstring(m, flag ? NULL : sp, NULL)) != 0)
826 return r;
827 return 0;
828}
829
830int
831sshauthopt_serialise(const struct sshauthopt *opts, struct sshbuf *m,
832 int untrusted)
833{
834 int r = SSH_ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR;
835
836 /* Flag and simple integer options */
837 if ((r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->permit_port_forwarding_flag)) != 0 ||
838 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->permit_agent_forwarding_flag)) != 0 ||
839 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->permit_x11_forwarding_flag)) != 0 ||
840 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->permit_pty_flag)) != 0 ||
841 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->permit_user_rc)) != 0 ||
842 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->restricted)) != 0 ||
843 (r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->cert_authority)) != 0 ||
844 (r = sshbuf_put_u64(m, opts->valid_before)) != 0)
845 return r;
846
847 /* tunnel number can be negative to indicate "unset" */
848 if ((r = sshbuf_put_u8(m, opts->force_tun_device == -1)) != 0 ||
849 (r = sshbuf_put_u32(m, (opts->force_tun_device < 0) ?
850 0 : (u_int)opts->force_tun_device)) != 0)
851 return r;
852
853 /* String options; these may be NULL */
854 if ((r = serialise_nullable_string(m,
855 untrusted ? "yes" : opts->cert_principals)) != 0 ||
856 (r = serialise_nullable_string(m,
857 untrusted ? "true" : opts->force_command)) != 0 ||
858 (r = serialise_nullable_string(m,
859 untrusted ? NULL : opts->required_from_host_cert)) != 0 ||
860 (r = serialise_nullable_string(m,
861 untrusted ? NULL : opts->required_from_host_keys)) != 0)
862 return r;
863
864 /* Array options */
865 if ((r = serialise_array(m, opts->env,
866 untrusted ? 0 : opts->nenv)) != 0 ||
867 (r = serialise_array(m, opts->permitopen,
868 untrusted ? 0 : opts->npermitopen)) != 0 ||
869 (r = serialise_array(m, opts->permitlisten,
870 untrusted ? 0 : opts->npermitlisten)) != 0)
871 return r;
872
873 /* success */
874 return 0;
875}
876
877int
878sshauthopt_deserialise(struct sshbuf *m, struct sshauthopt **optsp)
879{
880 struct sshauthopt *opts = NULL;
881 int r = SSH_ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR;
882 u_char f;
883 u_int tmp;
884
885 if ((opts = calloc(1, sizeof(*opts))) == NULL)
886 return SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
887
888#define OPT_FLAG(x) \
889 do { \
890 if ((r = sshbuf_get_u8(m, &f)) != 0) \
891 goto out; \
892 opts->x = f; \
893 } while (0)
894 OPT_FLAG(permit_port_forwarding_flag);
895 OPT_FLAG(permit_agent_forwarding_flag);
896 OPT_FLAG(permit_x11_forwarding_flag);
897 OPT_FLAG(permit_pty_flag);
898 OPT_FLAG(permit_user_rc);
899 OPT_FLAG(restricted);
900 OPT_FLAG(cert_authority);
901#undef OPT_FLAG
902
903 if ((r = sshbuf_get_u64(m, &opts->valid_before)) != 0)
904 goto out;
905
906 /* tunnel number can be negative to indicate "unset" */
907 if ((r = sshbuf_get_u8(m, &f)) != 0 ||
908 (r = sshbuf_get_u32(m, &tmp)) != 0)
909 goto out;
910 opts->force_tun_device = f ? -1 : (int)tmp;
911
912 /* String options may be NULL */
913 if ((r = deserialise_nullable_string(m, &opts->cert_principals)) != 0 ||
914 (r = deserialise_nullable_string(m, &opts->force_command)) != 0 ||
915 (r = deserialise_nullable_string(m,
916 &opts->required_from_host_cert)) != 0 ||
917 (r = deserialise_nullable_string(m,
918 &opts->required_from_host_keys)) != 0)
919 goto out;
920
921 /* Array options */
922 if ((r = deserialise_array(m, &opts->env, &opts->nenv)) != 0 ||
923 (r = deserialise_array(m,
924 &opts->permitopen, &opts->npermitopen)) != 0 ||
925 (r = deserialise_array(m,
926 &opts->permitlisten, &opts->npermitlisten)) != 0)
927 goto out;
928
929 /* success */
930 r = 0;
931 *optsp = opts;
932 opts = NULL;
933 out:
934 sshauthopt_free(opts);
935 return r;
936}
